summary: While undercover officer Kit is taken prisoner by the syndicate, he befriends his keeper and discovers an organ trafficking ring.
cast: Tony Jaa|Jing Wu|Simon Yam|Jin Zhang|Louis Koo|Ken Lo|Jun Kung|Dominic Lam|Babyjohn Choi|Philip Keung|Andrew Ng|Wai Ai|Aaron Chow|Alex Mai|Chik-Chi Tsim|Kiki Yeung|Chi Zhang
title: SPL2. A time for consequences
